question: Who is the author of the book, ‘The Winning Sixer’, which was released recently?
explanation:
Former Indian cricketer and the current Head Coach of National women’s team, W.V.Raman is the author of the book titled, ‘The Winning Sixer- Leadership Lessons to Master’.
The book was released recently by another veteran cricketer and Coach Anil Kumble, in presence of Rahul Dravid and Mithali Raj. In the sports-leadership book, W.V.Raman has narrated his own experiences and those of other cricket players. The books portraits the importance of leadership in all walks of life including sports.
